summary: This document is an email chain from October 2020 among U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) personnel regarding a discovery review project. The project involves reviewing email files to identify portions related to the conditions of confinement for Tartaglione or emails regarding Touhy, for potential redaction. The emails also reference a prior incident where Tartaglione was questioned about an attack on Epstein.

persons.name: Tartaglione
persons.context: An inmate whose conditions of confinement are the subject of a discovery review; was previously questioned about an attack on Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Referenced in relation to a past incident where Tartaglione was questioned about an attack on him, and where Epstein informed a psychologist about Tartaglione.

connections.description: Tartaglione was questioned about an attack on Epstein, and Epstein informed a psychologist that Tartaglione discussed potentially injuring him.

events.title: Discovery Review Project
events.description: U.S. Attorney's Office personnel review email files to identify content related to Tartaglione's confinement or emails regarding Touhy for potential redaction.

events.title: Tartaglione Questioned About Epstein Attack
events.description: A past news story reported Tartaglione was questioned about an attack on Jeffrey Epstein while both were at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).

events.title: Epstein Reports Tartaglione Threat
events.description: Epstein informed a psychologist that Tartaglione had discussed potentially injuring him, but no guards' report was filed.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office was conducting a discovery review in October 2020 to identify documents related to inmate Tartaglione's conditions of confinement and emails regarding 'Touhy'.
The review flagged email chains where Tartaglione's counsel discussed a leak/retaliation regarding a news story about Tartaglione being questioned about an attack on Epstein.
Epstein had previously informed a psychologist that Tartaglione discussed potentially injuring him, an incident for which there was no guards' report.
The correspondence shows internal government deliberation about whether to withhold certain documents related to Tartaglione that also reference Epstein.
